TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MathFont extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.OpenXmlLeafElement

Docs.summary: Math Font. When the object is serialized out as xml, its qualified name is m:mathFont.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **mathFont (Math Font)** This element specifies the default math font to be used in the document. If this element is omitted, font substitution (§17.8.2) should be used to determine the most appropriate font for use throughout the document. [*Example*: The XML containing this property is: ```xml ``` *end example*] [*Example*: Given the following equation: and the following XML: ```xml ``` Because the document option for Math font is set to the mathematically enabled font Cambria Math, Math is formatted with that font. *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |mathPr (§22.1.2.62)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (value)|Specifies the default math font to be used in the document.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_String* simple type (§22.9.2.13).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_String) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks The following information from the ECMA International [Standard ECMA-376](http://www.ecma-international.org/publications/standards/Ecma-376.htm) can be useful when working with this class.
Specifies the default math font to be used in the document.
The possible values for this attribute are defined by the `ST_String` simple type.
